roleset.name: to eat or drink voraciously

example.name: transitive
example.text: Ever since the link to cholesterol was disclosed [*-1] , Americans have begun [*]scarfing up psyllium in their breakfast cereals .

roleset.note: SCARF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'scarf' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from scarf.01-v predicate notes)
